duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute sourcing strategies to secure raw materials, ensure transparency, quality, and maintain cost, integrity, and compliance.
Lead risk management strategies and implement Global Funding the Growth programs.
Coordinate continuous improvement programs with suppliers and participate in external industry forums.
Support the implementation of sustainability roadmaps and develop an understanding of market structure and drivers for materials.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in a technical or business field (MBA preferred)
